member.name: ASSOCIATIONTYPE
member.summary: Specifies the type of association for an application. Used by methods of the interface.

member.name: ASSOCIATIONTYPE.AT_FILEEXTENSION
member.summary: Indicates a file name extension, such as .htm or .mp3.

member.name: ASSOCIATIONTYPE.AT_URLPROTOCOL
member.summary: Indicates a protocol, such as http or mailto.

member.name: ASSOCIATIONTYPE.AT_STARTMENUCLIENT
member.summary: Indicates the owner of the startmenu client for a mail or Internet hyperlink. As of Windows 7, this value is used only for the MAPI sendmail client.

member.name: ASSOCIATIONTYPE.AT_MIMETYPE
member.summary: Indicates the MIME type, such as audio/mp3.
